column1: Andustar was the western promontory of Númenor
column2: separated from the Hyarnustar to the south by the wide Bay of Eldanna. The Andustar formed a very roughly rectangular region
column4: and 160 kilometres north to south. To the east
column5: it bordered the Forostar and Mittalmar regions
column6: but in all other directions it was surrounded by the ocean.

column1: The Andustar was a generally fertile region
column3: where the landscape became higher and rockier
column4: and forested by Firs. Its western shores were broken by three bays
column5: with the northernmost of these being the Bay of Andúnië. On the high land around this bay
column6: the Númenóreans built the port and city of Andúnië
column7: whose :Category:Lords of Andúnië were to be the ancestors of the Kings of Arnor and Kings of Gondor.
